issue.title: [CF 804] color options per group/icon
issue.body:
I'd love to manually desaturate and recolor my icons instead of being restricted by global color schemes.
An alternative would be adding an event for desaturating and recoloring icons.

While the 'Color Flash' event can be used as color overlay if the flash period is set to 0 seconds, the color will be added additively instead of multiplicatively.

That would be a great addition to an already great addon. Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Daeling | Imported from CurseForge issue #804 | Raw

comments.body:
